episodes.title: From Preacher to Tyrant: The Rise and Fall of Jim Jones (Cult Documentary) | @RealStories
episodes.description:
🎥 Ready to explore the captivating yet chilling story of the People's Temple and its charismatic leader, Jim Jones? Welcome to "Cult of Personality," where we unravel the gripping tale behind one of history's most infamous cults.

🔍 Join us as we delve into the intriguing journey of the People's Temple, from its early days of inclusivity to the shocking depths of manipulation and tragedy under Jim Jones' reign.

💡 Discover the psychological tactics used by cult leaders to maintain control and loyalty, including staged threats and simulated attacks to test devotion.

🌎 Follow along as we trace the cult's path from Indiana to California and finally to the remote jungles of Jonestown, Guyana, where the world was rocked by the devastating events of the Jonestown massacre in 1978.Twitter: https://twitter.com/realstoriesdocs
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/RealStoriesChannel
Instagram - @realstoriesdocs
